overview.en: DF is the platform utility token of the dForce network to be used for transaction services, community governance, system stabilizer, incentivization, validator deposit when we migrate to staking model, and etc.
overview.zh: DF是dForce Network的应用型平台代币，主要用于支付交易手续费、保险机制、社区治理和激励等方面，后期切换到自己的主网时会用作Staking维护网络安全。
